full_summary:
# Vehicle Commercial/Heavy Truck Spare Parts Tender Notice
## Document Information:
- **Reference Number**: cb-733-19125249
- **Solicitation Number**: W8486-259769/A
- **Publication Date**: June 20, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: July 30, 2024, at 14:00
- **Amendment Date**: July 30, 2024

## Procurement Information:
- **Procurement Category**: Goods (GD)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contract Requirements:
The Department of National Defence invites bids to supply the following items:
- **Item 1**: Slings, Eye, Part No.: EE4-903X30 TYPE 4-SE, NCAGE: 66201, Quantity: 114
    • Unit of Issue: Each
    • Delivery Location: 25 Canadian Forces Supply Depot (25 CFSD), 6363 Notre Dame East, Montreal, Quebec H1N 3V9
- **Item 2**: Slings, Eye, Part No.: EE4-903X30 TYPE 4-SE, NCAGE: 66201, Quantity: 76
    • Unit of Issue: Each
    • Delivery Location: 7 Canadian Forces Supply Depot (7 CFSD), 195 Ave -82nd Street, Bldg. 236, Edmonton, Alberta T5J 4J5

## Submission Requirements:
- **Submission Method**: Electronic submission by email only
- **Contact Information**: Doriane Marcoux, doriane.marcoux@forces.gc.ca, (000) 000-0000

## Important Notes:
- **Language**: Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
- **Debriefing**: Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process within 15 working days from receipt of the results.
- **Contracting Agency Reserves Rights**: The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

## Attachments:
You can download the solicitation document from the following links:
- English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40706/w8486-259769-rfp_eng_0.pdf
- French: https://canadabuys.canada
